name: CalRx OTC Naloxone Nasal Spray
description: CalRx is California's initiative to make naloxone, a life-saving medication that reverses opioid overdoses, affordable and accessible to all residents without a prescription.
fullDescription: CalRx is California's initiative to make naloxone, a life-saving medication that reverses opioid overdoses, affordable and accessible to all residents without a prescription.
whatTheyOffer:
- 4mg naloxone nasal spray (Narcan-equivalent)
- Twin pack for $19 plus shipping
- No prescription required
- Significantly below retail price ($45+)
- Simple nasal spray administration
- Shelf life of 2+ years
howToGetIt: Order online at CalRx.ca.gov. Add to cart, enter shipping information, and pay by credit card. Delivered directly to your home. Training videos available on the website.
keywords: CalRx, naloxone, Narcan, opioid overdose, fentanyl, overdose reversal, nasal spray, opioid crisis, harm reduction, OTC
